title: Team
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When Analytics runs a Test & Target Interstitial
and targets to Astros, Rockies, Mariners or Pirates
custom_expected: Then the user should see the the interstitial on the team page

title: Frequency
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When Analytics runs a Test & Target Interstitial
and targets to a team
and targets to frequency
custom_expected: Then the user should see the the interstitial displayed for that team and that frequency

title: Activate with Pay TV Account
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When Analytics runs a Test & Target Interstitial
and targets to Astros, Rockies, Mariners or Pirates
and the user observes the Test & Target Interstitial 
and taps on Activate with Pay TV Account button
custom_expected: Then the user is taken to the Adobe Pass Cable Auth

title: Continue to Team Page
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When Analytics runs a Test & Target Interstitial
and targets to Astros, Rockies, Mariners or Pirates
and the user observes the Test & Target Interstitial 
and taps on Continue to Team Page
custom_expected:
Then the Test & Target Interstitial is dismissed
and the user is left at the team page
and the user can swipe the team page

title: Config
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is in Root Sports local market
and the user has not authenicated to a local market stream
and Analytics targets to users have not authenticated
custom_expected: Then the user is able to see the proper Test and Target Interstitial

title: Out of Market
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is on a team page for Astros, Rockies, Mariners or Pirates
and the user is in not in local markets (based on zip code)
and a game with a TV feed is live
custom_expected: Then the user will not see the Team Page IMS Module

title: Media Off State
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is on a team page for Astros, Rockies, Mariners or Pirates
and the user is in local markets (based on zip code)
and a game with a TV feed is not live
custom_expected: Then the Team Page IMS Module is not displayed

title: Media On State
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is on a team page for Astros, Rockies, Mariners or Pirates
and the user is in local markets (based on zip code)
and a game with a TV feed is live

custom_steps_separated.content: Then the Team Page IMS Module is displayed between Top Stories and Top videos
Then the Section Title is Watch Live on (ROOT or AT&T) Sports
Then the Module Title is <Away Team> @ <Home Team>
Then the Body is Free for eligible in-market Pay TV subscribers
Then has a Live button same as MLB.TV EPG
Then has a Team Logo Matchup Thumbnail

title: Authentication - No MLB.com creds
custom_preconds:
Given a user has At Bat installed
and is not logged in with MLB.com
custom_steps:
When a user taps on the Authenticate with your Pay TV Provider button
and is on the Adobe Cable Auth page
custom_expected: Then the user will use Adobe Pass for authentication

title: Authentication - MLB creds
custom_preconds:
Given a user has At Bat installed
and is logged in with MLB.com
custom_steps:
When a user taps on the Authenticate with your Pay TV Provider button
and is on the Adobe Cable Auth page
custom_expected: Then the user will use Adobe Pass for authentication

title: Authentication - Cable Auth Pass
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user taps on the Authenticate with your Pay TV Provider button
and is on the Adobe Cable Auth page
and goes through cable auth with successful creds
custom_expected: Then the user can view the feed

title: Authentication - Cable Auth Fail
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user taps on the Authenticate with your Pay TV Provider button
and is on the Adobe Cable Auth page
and goes through cable auth with unsuccessful creds
custom_expected:
Then the user can not view the feed
and proper messaging displayed

title: Re-authentication
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user successfully cable auth into feed
and closes out of the feed
and attempts to access the feed again
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see the feed
and will not have to re auth

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user successfully cable auth into feed
and closes out of the feed
and attempts to access the feed again after about an hour
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be forced to re-auth

title: Media Authentication Playback
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with MLB.TV account
and a ROOT or AT&T Sports user is in Astros, Rockies, Mariners or Pirates local markets (based on zip code)
and user enters flow clicking on the IMS Module on the team page

custom_steps_separated.content: if the user already has auth token
if the user does not have a token
custom_steps_separated.expected: the app should present the Adobe Pass flow
the user will receive a confirmation page
the app should receive a auth token to store locally
the user location should be checked using GPS

custom_steps_separated.content: If there is a location or entitlement error
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user should be shown an error screen

title: Media Player
custom_preconds: Given a user is an At Bat user
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with MLB.TV account
and a Root Sports user is in Astros, Rockies, Mariners or Pirates local markets (based on zip code)
and user enters flow clicking on the IMS Module on the team page
and successfully auths 
and the feed starts
custom_expected:
Then Root Sports playback experience to be differentiated from the MLB.TV experience
and it should include a ROOT or AT&T Sports logo
and there should not be a feed selector drop-down
